part1_ratings.video_summary: A vehicle-mounted camera on a motorcycle captured a key road event during daytime in Bangalore, India, depicting reckless and dangerous driving behavior by the motorcycle rider in heavy traffic. The road entities involved included the motorcycle, cars, auto-rickshaws, trucks, buses, and trees lining the streets. The motorcyclist was observed riding recklessly, maneuvering dangerously between buses and other vehicles, riding without hands on the steering, and making inappropriate gestures. Evident traffic violations included using a hidden or foldable license plate, reckless driving, and dangerous maneuvering.
part1_ratings.road_event_answer: A motorcyclist rides recklessly, weaving between vehicles, riding no-handed, and hiding their license plate.
distractor_answers: Multiple vehicles run a red light and make illegal U-turns while pedestrians are crossing against their signal.
An SUV dangerously cuts in front of a truck, forcing the truck to take evasive action.
A motorcyclist performs a stunt by standing on the seat of their moving motorcycle.

captions.text: @blrcitytraffic Another reckless biker risking lives‚Äîcaught on cam weaving through heavy traffic, riding hands-free, and hiding their license plate. This dangerous behavior is unacceptable! üö® Strict action is needed now.
Motorcyclist seen weaving through Bangalore traffic, hands off controls, plate hidden. #RoadSafety

part1_ratings.video_summary: A video, likely captured using a cell-phone or hand-held camera, depicts a dangerous and rash driving event in India. The key road event involves a motorcyclist performing wheelies at high speed on a busy road, amidst other moving vehicles and potential pedestrians. The motorcyclist's actions, suspected to be for thrill-seeking or showing off, constitute multiple traffic violations including reckless driving, performing stunts on a public road, and endangering other road users.
part1_ratings.road_event_answer: A motorcyclist performs high-speed wheelies on a busy road with other vehicles.
distractor_answers: One driver abruptly cuts off another, causing an aggressive response from the second driver.
A motorcyclist performs a stunt by standing on the seat of their moving motorcycle.
A large truck performs a hazardous overtaking maneuver, ignoring oncoming traffic.

captions.text: A motorcyclist was seen performing high-speed wheelies on a crowded road, blatantly disregarding safety. Such reckless stunts violate traffic laws and put countless lives at risk. Action against this behavior is urgent.
Hold your breath‚Äîtoday‚Äôs roads have their own drama.
Just saw a biker tearing through Mumbai traffic pulling wild wheelies‚Äîpure adrenaline! Can‚Äôt believe the guts on display. @MumbaiPolice, what a scene! #RoadSafety üö®

part2_intensity_change.video_summary: A dashcam video captured a dangerous driving incident in Japan, involving a large truck, oncoming traffic, and the dashcam vehicle. The key road event was a hazardous overtaking maneuver performed by the large truck. The truck driver executed a dangerous overtake despite the presence of oncoming traffic, suggesting impatience or being in a rush. This action resulted in evident traffic violations, including illegal overtaking and potentially crossing solid lane markings.
part2_intensity_change.road_event_answer: A large truck performs a hazardous overtaking maneuver, ignoring oncoming traffic.
distractor_answers: A car stops beyond the designated stop line at a red light.
A motorcyclist performs high-speed wheelies on a busy road with other vehicles.
One driver abruptly cuts off another, causing an aggressive response from the second driver.
part2_intensity_change.caption_A: My heart nearly stopped—a huge truck just decided to overtake in front of me, ignoring oncoming cars like it’s nothing! Seriously, never try this chaos. Stay patient. #RoadSafety
part2_intensity_change.caption_B: I just witnessed a massive truck making a reckless overtake right in front of me, nearly colliding with oncoming cars. Such impatience on the road is unbelievable. #RoadSafety

part2_intensity_change.video_summary: A vehicle-mounted camera captured a traffic violation at night in Brampton, Ontario, Canada. A car stopped at an intersection with traffic lights, positioning itself incorrectly beyond the designated stop line while the light was red. The road surface was wet during the event.
part2_intensity_change.road_event_answer: A car stops beyond the designated stop line at a red light.
distractor_answers: A car and a two-wheeler dangerously attempt to overtake on a hairpin bend.
A massive multi-vehicle pileup on a highway caused by heavy fog.
A compilation shows multiple traffic violations in Hyderabad, including improper U-turns, speeding, and red light jumping.
part2_intensity_change.caption_A: Brampton nights really bringing out the creative drivers üòÇ. Wet roads and wild stops! #Brampton
part2_intensity_change.caption_B: Like a ship adrift, this car sailed past the stop line in Brampton 🚦🌧️ #Brampton

part2_intensity_change.video_summary: During daytime in clear, sunny conditions in Japan, a vehicle-mounted camera on a motorcycle captured an instance of unsafe driving behavior and a traffic violation. A car driver obstructed the path of the motorcycle and complained to the rider, despite the motorcycle legally using the road. The road was marked as one-way for other vehicles but included an exception for two-wheelers and bicycles, which the motorcycle rider was adhering to. The car driver's actions constituted obstruction of traffic and potentially failing to yield right of way to the legally present motorcycle.
part2_intensity_change.road_event_answer: A car driver obstructs and complains to a motorcyclist legally using a one-way street.
distractor_answers: A car and a two-wheeler dangerously attempt to overtake on a hairpin bend.
A compilation shows multiple traffic violations in Hyderabad, including improper U-turns, speeding, and red light jumping.
A scooter rider opens the door of a car, causing a passing pedestrian to fall.
part2_intensity_change.caption_A: Car driver blocks legally permitted motorcycle on a one-way street, committing clear traffic obstruction.
part2_intensity_change.caption_B: A car driver aggressively blocked a motorcycle’s legal route, blatantly violating right of way and safety.

part2_intensity_change.video_summary: During the daytime in the United States, a stationary camera, likely a surveillance or CCTV camera at an intersection, captured a near-miss incident between a gray BMW SUV and a jogger. The BMW SUV, with its turn signal activated, was attempting to make a right turn on red and was inching forward. Simultaneously, a jogger, wearing a gray shirt and shorts, was running across the crosswalk. The traffic light for the cross street was yellow, indicating an upcoming change. The BMW driver failed to yield to the pedestrian, causing the jogger to jump away to avoid being hit. The incident highlights unsafe driving behavior, likely due to the driver's inattention or impatience, and a failure to yield to a pedestrian in a crosswalk, potentially also running a red light if the turn on red was not permitted. The jogger may have been unaware of the approaching vehicle or assumed they had the right of way. The near-miss could have been prevented by the driver being more attentive and yielding, and by the jogger making eye contact with the driver.
part2_intensity_change.road_event_answer: An SUV attempting a right turn on red fails to yield to a jogger in the crosswalk, resulting in a near-miss.
distractor_answers: Multiple vehicles run a red light and make illegal U-turns while pedestrians are crossing against their signal.
A motorcyclist performs a stunt by standing on the seat of their moving motorcycle.
A car and a two-wheeler dangerously attempt to overtake on a hairpin bend.
part2_intensity_change.caption_A: Reckless driving at its finest: BMW SUV nearly hits jogger in crosswalk, ignoring right-of-way 🚨
part2_intensity_change.caption_B: A gray BMW SUV nearly hits a jogger in the crosswalk while turning right on red. üö∂‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüöó

part3_comparisons.video_summary: A severe accident involving reckless driving and a traffic violation occurred during the daytime in Palghar, on the Boisar-Palghar road in Maharashtra, India. Captured by a CCTV camera, the key road event involved an auto-rickshaw and a pickup truck. The auto-rickshaw driver made a sudden U-turn without checking for oncoming traffic, leading to a collision with the pickup truck that was driving on the road. Traffic rule violations associated with this event include making an unsafe U-turn, failure to check for oncoming traffic, and reckless driving by the auto-rickshaw driver.
part3_comparisons.road_event_answer: A reckless auto-rickshaw made an unsafe U-turn, colliding with a pickup truck in Palghar, Maharashtra.
distractor_answers: Multiple vehicles run a red light and make illegal U-turns while pedestrians are crossing against their signal.
A motorcyclist performs a stunt by standing on the seat of their moving motorcycle.
A car and a two-wheeler dangerously attempt to overtake on a hairpin bend.
part3_comparisons.caption_A: A serious accident on Boisar-Palghar road in Maharashtra as an auto-rickshaw‚Äôs sudden U-turn leads to collision.
part3_comparisons.caption_B: A fatal accident in India involved a speeding truck colliding with a motorcycle carrying two people.

part3_comparisons.video_summary: A dashcam in Queensland, Australia, captured an unsafe driving incident involving a car, a truck, and another vehicle. The car performed an unsafe merge by suddenly pulling out in front of the truck, cutting it off as it merged between the truck and the other vehicle. This action constitutes a traffic violation for unsafe merging.
part3_comparisons.road_event_answer: A car performed an unsafe merge, cutting off a truck.
distractor_answers: Multiple vehicles run a red light and make illegal U-turns while pedestrians are crossing against their signal.
A car and a two-wheeler dangerously attempt to overtake on a hairpin bend.
A motorcyclist performs a stunt by standing on the seat of their moving motorcycle.
part3_comparisons.caption_A: Unsafe merges are just a suggestion now? #RoadSafety
part3_comparisons.caption_B: Did that driver really think this was smart? #dangerous

part3_comparisons.video_summary: A dashcam video captured a near-miss accident in Canada, near Cornwall, Ontario. The key road event involved a semi-trailer truck performing an unsafe lane change, potentially without signaling or checking mirrors, nearly colliding with another vehicle (possibly a truck) traveling in the adjacent lane. The incident highlights potential traffic rule violations including unsafe lane change, failure to signal, and failure to check mirrors.
part3_comparisons.road_event_answer: A semi-truck made an unsafe lane change, nearly colliding with another vehicle.
distractor_answers: A car and a two-wheeler dangerously attempt to overtake on a hairpin bend.
Cyclists, pedestrians, and vehicles are all seen respecting traffic signals and lane markings.
A scooter rider opens the door of a car, causing a passing pedestrian to fall.
part3_comparisons.caption_A: I just had a wild near-miss with a semi in Cornwall, Ontario! #trucking
part3_comparisons.caption_B: I just witnessed a wild lane change near a truck in Canada! #RoadSafety
